author: Luis Cruz
subject: Re: The New FAQ
body:
> But it has one minor flaw: how do non-members of the Lupin ML find it?!

They are not supposed to quite yet; I am trying to work out a plan to
have Steve Pearl mirror the site where the old FAQ is.  Plus, I wanted
some feedback from the ML members to see if it could use some polishing
up before the rest of the world sees it.

> surprised you don't have links to any of your sub-directories from there.
> Perhaps a good suggestion...?

Had them there; figured no one really cared about my homepage much.
The AVRC is found through AniPike and most search engines.

> reviews, editorials... basically what I was planning on slapping into my
> site, but with the classic info to back it up). I'm still open to ideas
> on a two-man project....

I sent you an email about that possiblity a few weeks ago; guess you
never got it.  I am definitely open to the idea.

---
Luis A. Cruz
cruzl@ccs.neu.edu
Homepage:  http://www.ccs.neu.edu/home/cruzl/
Lupin FAQ:  http://www.ccs.neu.edu/home/cruzl/lupin/faq/
Anime Video Game Resource Center:  http://www.ccs.neu.edu/home/cruzl/avrc/
